DOC.criteria: Gender Male Age 1870 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 32 kg/m2 Plasma triglycerides 14 mmol/l Plasma cholesterol < 8 mmol/l Glucose < 7 mmol/l Haemoglobin > 11 g/dl ApoE E3/E3 , E3/E4 Blood pressure > 200/95 mmHg Had suffer myocardial infraction stroke previous 2 year .
